Package com.epam.facultative.controller.actions

package com.epam.facultative.controller.actions
Containing all required actions to execute by front-controller. Action - super interface for all actions classes ActionFactory - provides easy access to action ActionUtil - util methods to use in actions Package implementation contains all action implementations
Version:
1.0
Author:
Oleksandr Panchenko
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.epam.facultative.controller
    Containing front-controller Controller and next packages: actions - to call by controller app_context - to create required instances filters - to filter requests listener - to react on events tags - to use on jsp pages constants - to required value with action names, page names, access and attribute names
    com.epam.facultative.controller.actions.impl
    Containing all action implementations.
    com.epam.facultative.controller.app_context
    Containing all classes to property set up and configure application context.
    com.epam.facultative.controller.constants
    Package containing constants all required constants: ActionNames - for action names ActionAccess - for access actions for filter Attribute - for parameter req PageAccess - for access pages for filter PageName - for page names
    com.epam.facultative.controller.filters
    Containing all filters; AuthFilter - to check access for logged user EncodingFilter - to set up encoding LocaleFilter - to set up and change locale
    com.epam.facultative.controller.listener
    Containing all listeners: ContextListener - to set up all required objects
    com.epam.facultative.controller.tags
    Containing all tags to use on jsp pages: ShowResult - to return result
  • Class
    Description
    Action
    Action interface.
    ActionFactory
    Containing all available actions and method to get any of them.
    ActionUtils
    Containing utils methods to use in actions.
